title: Anger at work
creator_credit: Oaklahoma. State Dept. of Health, International Film Bureau and Ned Huckman
brief_description: Explains the mechanisms of man’s personality which induces displacement of anger onto other men and impairs efficiency in everyday living. Dramatizes techniques that have been developed for handling anger, resentment and frustration
